value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. value.title: Append vs Merge in Power BI and Power Query

value.title: Export the Data of a Power BI table entirely in a few Clicks

value.title: Generate Year and Month Combinations in Power BI Report using DAX
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.title: Getting Started with Dataflow in Microsoft Fabric Data Factory
value.excerpt: The Dataflow in Microsoft Fabric is an element for getting the data from the source, transforming it, and loading it into a destination.
